message.text: Resource leak: The system resource will not be reclaimed and reused, reducing the future availability of the resource.
SQL injection: A user can change the intent of the SQL query, which may inappropriately disclose or corrupt data within the database.
Dereference null return value: If the function actually returns a null value, a NullPointerException will be thrown.

Empty Password: The application creates a database connection using an empty password string. An attacker who  guesses or otherwise obtains a username with an empty password needs no further information to  authenticate to the database and access protected data.
Resource leak: The system resource will not be reclaimed and reused, reducing the future availability of the resource.

fullDescription.text: The system resource will not be reclaimed and reused, reducing the future availability of the resource.

shortDescription.text: Untrusted user-supplied data is inserted into a SQL statement without adequate validation, escaping, or filtering.

fullDescription.text: A user can change the intent of the SQL query, which may inappropriately disclose or corrupt data within the database.

shortDescription.text: Return value of function which returns null is dereferenced without checking

fullDescription.text: If the function actually returns a null value, a NullPointerException will be thrown.

shortDescription.text: The application creates a database connection using an empty password string. An attacker who  guesses or otherwise obtains a username with an empty password needs no further information to  authenticate to the database and access protected data.
